title: MASTERCLASS CYCLE: Various topics on Choral Music
details: Masterclasses and webinars by special guests on selected choral music topics, hosted and curated by Director of Choral Studies, Antonio Llaca

title: CONFERENCE: Online Rehearsal Technique
details: Online conference on rehearsal technique and tools in an online envioronment. This session will be presented in Spanish

title: ONLINE FESTIVAL PERFORMANCES
details: The Choeur du Conservatoire de Musique de Gatineau under conductor Antonio Llaca will be performing online along side choirs and performers from around the world

title: CONFERENCE: Online Rehearsal techniques
details: Online conference on rehearsal technique and tools in an online envioronment. Sponsored by the ACCM there will be two sessions one in English and one in French

title: CONFERENCE: English and French Diction for Choral Conductors
details: Conference on English and French diction for choral conductors in Latin America. Presentation in Spanish as part of Vocal Terra International Choral Festival

title: CONFERENCE: Online Rehearsal techniques
details: Online conference on rehearsal technique and tools in an online envioronment. Sponsored by the UNM and Camerata Vocal de Lima as part of the 1st edition of Peru Canta International Choral Festival
